pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.dao

Class UserDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.dao.UserDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserDAO

    @Repository
public class UserDAOImpl
extends Object
implements UserDAO
    Repository class for performing database operations on User objects.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur
